director.name: 戴维·埃尔布罗纳 David Heilbroner

this_title: Say Her Name: The Life and Death of Sandra Bland
trans_title: 说出她的名字：桑德拉布兰德的生与死
introduction: Say Her Name: The Life and Death of Sandra Bland explores the death of Sandra Bland, a politically active 28-year-old African American who, after being arrested for a traffic violation in a small Texas town, was found hanging in her jail cell three days later. Dashcam footage revealing her arrest went viral, leading to national protests. The film team followed the two-year case...
chinese_title: 说出她的名字：桑德拉布兰德的生与死
foreign_title: Say Her Name: The Life and Death of Sandra Bland
